headline: Should F.N.B.'s (FNB) Cross-Border Payments Push Shift the Outlook for Its Growth Story?
summary: F.N.B. Corporation recently declared a quarterly cash dividend of US$0.12 per share, payable December 15, 2025, to shareholders of record as of December 1, 2025. Earlier this week, FNB and Mastercard jointly launched Globba™, a cross-border payments solution powered by Mastercard Move, aimed at streamlining and securing international remittances for South Africans to more than 120 countries. We’ll explore how this technology-driven expansion into cross-border payments could influence...
